name: Line and Dots Game
description:
Take turns connecting the dots to make lines and try to score the most number of boxes! Completing a box allows you to take another turn.

This was a very simple game I created only a couple weeks after I started learning programming and Unity. There are definitely ways this game could be improved (adding AI, altering the UI, creating a menu that lets you choose the number of players), but as a first project, I feel this game is complete (and good fun).
